import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Product } from '../../model/Product' import ShopItem from './ShopItem' import './ShopPage.css' interface Props{ listProduct:Product[] } export default function ProductsShow(props:Props) { const [inputSearch,setInputSearch]= useState('') return (
{props.listProduct.map((item)=>)} {/* */}
) }
